verses.content: Chun, hmârtieng lampuia, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun a mi ṭhuoi suok a; hmârtieng panga in zâwna um, hmun daidan epa pindan kêma chun a mi ṭhuoi lût a.
Hmartieng panga pindan chu a sei tieng tawng za khat a na; a khang tieng chu tawng sâwmnga a nih.
Huon sûng tuollai sûngril lema ṭhang tawng sâwmhni zâwna le, huon sûng tuollai puo lem epa lungpha zâwna chun dawdan inep ṭhieuin sâwng thumin a um a.
Chun, pindanhai hmaa chun, sûnglûtin inlawnna tawng sâwma lien, tawng za khata sei a um a; chun, an kawtkhârhai chu hmar sawng an nih.
Chun, pindan chunghnung lem- hai chu an tawi lem a; dawdanhai chun a hnuoihnung le a laitak nêkin ina chun hmun an aw lien lem sih a.
Sâwng thum an ni sih a; huon sûng tuollaia sûtpuihai ang kha sûtpui an nei ve nawh a; chuleiin, a chunghnung tak chu a hnuoia nêkin ân têp a, a hnuoihnung tak nêkin a lailung chu ân têp lem a.
Pindan kêmhai zâwn pei puoah, tuollai puo lem tiengah pindanhai epa ân huonna chu tawng sâwmngaa sei a nih.
Huon sûng tuollai puo lema pin- dan chu a dung tieng tawng sâwmnga an ni sih a; chun, ngai ta, biekin tuola chun tawng za khat a nih.
Hieng pindanhai hnuoia hin saktieng pangah lûtna a um a, huon sûng tuollai puo lema inthawka lûtna chu.
Chutaka chun puo tieng bang ân ṭan a. Simtienga khawm huon sûng tuollai le inepa chun pindanhai an um bawk a.
An hmaa lampui chu hmâr- tienga pindanhai lampui ang bawk kha a na; an seizie le a khang tieng khawm ân ang; a suokna lampuihai le an rem dân dâm, a kawtkhârhai chenin ân ang vawng a nih.
Simtieng panga pindanhai hnuoia chun saktieng pangah lûtna a um a, chu chu fe thlengna lampui chu a nih. Chuonghai epa chun pindanna bang a um a.

Chun, ama chun ka kuomah, “Hmârtienga pindanhai le simtienga pindanhai, hmun âwl hmaa umhai hi, pindan inthieng, thiempu LALPA hnaituhaiin thil inthiengtakhai an fâkna ding a nih; chutaka chun thil inthiengtakhai chau chu sieng an tih, bu thilinhlân dâm, suol thilinhlân dâm, bawsietna thilinhlân dâm chu; chu hmun chu ân thieng sih a.

Thiempuhai chu an lût pha chun, huon sûng tuollai puo lema chun hmun inthienga inthawk chun an fe suok ding a ni nawh a, ami- ruokchu, chutaka chun, an rawng- bâwlnaa chun an silfênhai sieng an ta; an inthieng sih a; silfên dangin inbel an ta, chun, mipui tieng chu an hung hnai chau ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, in sûngril lem chu inkhi zo hnung chun, dâi kawtkhâr, sak- tieng nghaa chun a mi ṭhuoi suok a, chun, a vêl chun ân khi tah a.
Inkhina luonghmawl chun sak- tieng chu ân khi a, inkhina luong- hmawl chun a vêlin tawng za nga a nih.
Chun, hmârtienga khawm chun a vêlin, inkhina luonghmawl chun tawng za ngain ân khi bawk a.
Inkhina luonghmawl chun, sim- tieng pang khawm chu tawng za ngain ân khi a.
Chun, thlang tieng chu ân khi nâwk a, inkhina luonghmawl chun tawng za ngain ân khi a.
A sîr lia chun ân khi tah a, a sei tieng chu za nga, a khang tieng khawm za nga bawk, a vêlin bang a nei a, hmun narân le hmun inthieng chu ṭhena dingin.
